benefits.title: Print-Ready Files

defaultPhases.name: Discovery & Planning
defaultPhases.description: Understand objectives, gather content, and define specifications.

defaultPhases.name: Concept Design
defaultPhases.description: Create initial design concepts exploring layout, typography, and imagery.

defaultPhases.name: Refinement & Revisions
defaultPhases.description: Refine selected direction with up to two revision rounds.

defaultPhases.name: Final Production
defaultPhases.description: Prepare print-ready files with proper bleeds, marks, and color profiles.
